alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Leflore; Sunflower; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 10:55AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Sunflower, west central Leflore, northeastern Washington and southern Bolivar Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1055 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Doddsville to near Benoit to Arkansas City. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ruleville and Doddsville around 1100 AM CDT. Blaine around 1105 AM CDT. Sunflower around 1110 AM CDT. Shaw and Winterville around 1115 AM CDT. Greenville and Metcalfe around 1125 AM CDT. Leland and Itta Bena around 1130 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
